column1: Start_session description: Luthien proxy Codex bug bash: developer role + tool_calls sequencing + chat wire API + responses shim + logging workflow.

column5: Reference: prior conversation in /Users/scottwofford/build/luthien-private-session-logs/2026-01-31_codex-chat-wire-api-bug-fix.csv. This log captures the continuation in Codex.
Note: This conversation is with Codex (not Claude).
Resume prior Claude session, check objective.md + CSV, investigate Codex bug, switch to bug-bash branch, test, create PRs, add tests, update logs, and follow workflow.
Summarized repo state, branches/PRs, and outstanding objectives; created plans and instructed verification steps.
